title: Embrace
description: The moment we met I knew Brody Reinhardt was someone I could get lost in…if I wasn’t already so broken. My emotional and physical scars were a constant reminder of how dangerous love can be, but evidence that I survived.I vowed to never fall again, but he could be the one to help me heal. When I’m with him, I am safe in his embrace. I knew he had secrets of his own. I could see the weight of what he carried. We were just two people trying to escape our pasts. But the thing about the past, it always comes back when you least expect it. And when that day comes…will our love survive?EMBRACE is a crossover with TILL I KISSED YOU from THE BROKEN HERO series and will feature the heroes and heroines from The Salvation Series you love very much.
author: Michelle  Fernandez
